message: Let's make a deal quickly. This offer is highly advantageous to me, but it's still better for you to take it now than to wait for further rounds.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm offering you a fair deal that allows both of us to benefit.  Every round that passes hurts my share more than yours.
Bob, I understand the time pressure is on you more than me, but my offer is more than fair.  Let's settle this now before inflation eats away at your share even more.
